author: Jill Dalton from the Whole Food Plant Based Cooking Show
title: Cinnamon Roll Oatmeal
instructions_list: To make the oatmeal, in a high-speed blender, combine the water, dates, cinnamon, and vanilla. Blend until smooth and pour into a saucepan with the rolled oats. Cook until the oats reach your desired consistency.
To make the drizzle, combine all of the ingredients into a high-speed blender. Blend until smooth and creamy.
Divide the oatmeal into bowls, top with the drizzle, and garnish with pecans, as desired.
